Bridget

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1691
messages.msgSnippet: I usually don t get to use the computer unitl the evening time (after work, dinner,etc..) --it seems like all my posts are wayyy behind....... Anyway, just a
messages.messageBody:
I usually don't get to use the computer unitl the evening time (after work,
dinner,etc..)
--it seems like all my posts are wayyy behind.......
Anyway, just a little brag--my middle daughter, Rene, just got a full time
teaching position at her dance studio! She was the first of my kids to be
homeschooled, and, after having a couple of office jobs, she finally gets to
do what she loves for a living!
I'm so proud!!
Nancy
